name: True Justice
description:
True Justice is a retro First Person Shooter set in the Old West.

A Mysterious Villain known as The Man in Black is trying to organize all outlaws and criminal activity west of the Mississippi. His influence has spread among local Sheriffs, territorial Marshals, Judges, and has even reached the heights of government power in Washington D.C.

Your former commanding officer has been tasked with finding one man who can be trusted to take on the Man in Black and bring down his criminal enterprise, and he has chosen you to be that man.

This game is still early in development and we welcome all of your suggestions and comments to help make it better. After trying out the Demo join us in the Community Message Board and share your feedback.
